about_the_game:
Fun Quiz for Friends

Monstrobus Quiz is an exciting online trivia game designed for fun evenings with friends! It supports 2 to 16 players, who can compete in knowledge and cunning by using clever tricks and helpful boosts. Every round is unpredictable and full of surprises.

Strategy and Cunning

In the game, you’re not only answering questions but also influencing the gameplay with tricks and boosts. Want to slow down the leader or help yourself get out of last place? Use special effects to make the round more intense or give yourself an edge.

Create Your Own Question Packs

Monstrobus Quiz lets you create custom question packs, making each game unique and perfectly suited to your group’s mood. Come up with your own questions to add a personal touch and give your friends a real challenge!

Join the Fun!

Gather your friends, join the game, and enjoy thrilling competitions in the world of Monstrobus Quiz, where everything depends on your knowledge and cunning!
